short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the breathtaking beauty of Yosemite National Park to your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring the iconic Half Dome surrounded by vast granite peaks and lush pine forests beneath a clear blue sky, this extension creates a serene and refreshing atmosphere. Enjoy the calming presence of nature every time you open a new tab, with vibrant details and natural tones that inspire peace and focus.
